channel.title: Strip down your Windows 7 OS
channel.description:
First we had nLite for making a tiny Windows XP and then vLite for Windows Vista made by the same programmer. Now, just heard of this program called RT7Lite which will let anyone create a bootable, unattended ISO image with features to strip it down, tweak, customize, tweak, slipstream windows updates and slipstream software. :)
http://www.rt7lite.com
Made by Indians for everyone.
~Ron
PS For some reason the website is rt7lite but the name of the software program is RTSe7enLite... weird. I like 7Lite.
